casebody.data:
INTERSAL, INC.
v.
HAMILTON, et al. 115A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 2, 2018 David H. Harris, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Intersal, Inc. Brian Rabinovitz, Special Deputy Attorney General, Olga Vysotskaya de Brito, Special Deputy Attorney General, for North Carolina Department of Natural and Cultural Resources, et al. Amar Majmundar, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Charles G. Whitehead, Special Deputy Attorney General, for North Carolina Department of Natural and Cultural Resources, et al. Jeffrey A. Doyle, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Joshua D. Neighbors, Attorney at Law, for Friends of Queen Anne's Revenge (Non-Profit Corporation).

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of October 2018 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to Respond to Motion to Dismiss:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of October 2018."
